title: Bright newly remodeled studio MCAD UMN MCTC
posting_body: ['Remodeled Stevens Sq Studio, MCAD, walk to DWTN,  UMN.', 'MCTC', 'Property Address', '1905 Stevens Ave. SO.', '| 308 | Minneapolis, MN 55403', 'Available: NOW', 'Offered By', 'Gardner Investments, Inc.', 'Description', 'Remodeled corner studio in classic brownstone.', 'This bright, airy, corner unit is around 370 square feet and comes with  remodeled kitchen, bathroom, and huge walk in closet.', 'The closet is large enough to use as an office and has its own window.', ' Off street parking is available for an additional monthly fee.', 'We allow cats and dogs for additional monthly rent and $200.00 non refundable pet deposit.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'We require a $45.00 application fee per adult when applying.', 'Income must be 2.0 x the rent.', 'No Evictions or UD’s in the last 5 years.', 'No major credit accounts written off, delinquent, or in collections in last 5 years.', 'No felony convictions in the last five years or Misdemeanors in the last year.', 'Those with felonies for murder, rape, arson, or assault will be denied.', 'No major lease violations from previous Landlord references.', 'We accept first time renters and co-signers.', 'For more information about our classic apartments and homes for rent or to apply on line go to <URL>', 'units vary', 'Amenities', 'Remodeled kitchen', 'hardwood floors', 'natural woodwork', 'breakfast bar', 'on-line rent payment', 'on line maintenance requests', 'On site Laundry Facility', 'On direct bus line to West Bank', 'secured entry', 'on site management', '24 hour emergency service', '5 minute walk to downtown', 'Conveniently located near stores and restaurants', '2 blocks from MCAD', 'located a block from Eat Street', 'Common area surveilance', 'Closet with window large enough to use as office', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 1.0BA', 'Square Feet: 366', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $775.00', 'Available: 08/01/2022', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $775.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs allowed']
